briefTitle: Trial Comparing Morphine to Hydromorphone in Elderly Patients With Severe Pain
officialTitle: A Randomized Clinical Trial Comparing Intravenous Morphine and Intravenous Hydromorphone in the Treatment of Adult ED Patients With Moderate to Severe Pain
summary: The purpose of this research study is to determine which opiate pain medication (morphine or hydromorphone (Dilaudid)) is more effective in the treatment of acute pain in patients presenting to the emergency department.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to 30 minutes after medication infused
